Package tripleplay.ui.bgs

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BeveledBackground
    A background that displays a bevel around a solid color.
    BlankBackground
    A background that displays nothing.
    BorderedBackground
    A background that shows a line around a solid color.
    CenteredImageBackground
    Displays a background image, centered in the space defined for the background.
    CompositeBackground
    A background consisting of multiple other backgrounds.
    CroppedImageBackground
    Displays a background image, centered in the space defined for the background and cropped.
    ImageBackground
    A background that displays an image.
    RoundRectBackground
    Draws a rounded rectangle with optional border as a background.
    Scale9Background
    A background constructed by scaling the parts of a source image to fit the target width and height.
    Scale9Background.Axis3
    A horizontal or vertical axis, broken up into 3 chunks.
    SolidBackground
    A background that displays a solid color.
